ABOUT US

This is the official page for the Developer's Community of IIT Bombay. Envisioned as the group of best developers of the Institute, the team is responsible for developing and maintaining InstiApp, and other dev/tech related projects in the Institute.

Projects

Envisioned as the group of best developers of the Institute, the team is responsible for developing and maintaining InstiApp, Cerium and RPI Noticeboard and many other dev/tech related projects. Details regarding each of them can be accessed below.

Events Feed

The main feed will have only updates from Users and Entities that a User follows.

Placement Blog

The Placement/Training blog is available inside the app with the option to get notifications for All posts / posts with certain keywords.

Timetable

The user can create his academic timetable (manually, by adding courses) within the app itself. User will get an option to select predefined slots based on the Institute TImetable

Mess Menu

The mess menu for all hostels is available as a list (with the user’s hostel’s current day menu occupying the top position)

Calendar

The Calendar for the major bodies (Cult/Tech/any other body with a public calendar) will be available under this heading.

Map

The institute map along with current position and all currently active events visible as clickable icons.

Values Driven

Professionalism, integrity, innovation, teamwork, excellence, dedication are my top values.

Time Management

Prioritisation of tasks to ensure deadlines are met.

Social

A good work culture is important. This is built through effectively building work relationships with my team.

Results Oriented

Clearly defines outcomes and strives to deliver outstanding results.

Forensic Analyst

Can apply digital forensic techniques across various platforms including Windows, Linux and mobile devices; both host and network.

Empathy

Understanding the organisations and customer needs to work towards the ideal solution.
